description: Deep dish deliciousness is coming out hot and fast on the streets of Chicago, thanks to Giordano’s Food Truck. Giordano’s age-old recipe for saucy, cheesy goodness has made deep dish #1 in the Windy City’s pizza scene. Due to the fantastic quality of these savory stuffed pies, word has spread over the years and there are now several brick & mortar locations throughout the whole nation. In 2013, Giordano’s decided bust out a truck right in the special town where it all began.  Now hungry foodies at Chicago’s hottest fests can enjoy their famously tasty selection of incredible pizza (deep dish and thin crust), fresh salads, and yummy sandwiches. Even better, so can your guests at your next big event. Since Giordano’s supplies the Official Pizza of the Chicago Cubs and Wrigley Field, this state-of-the-art truck is definitely your best bet when it comes to providing the best party cuisine.
name: Giordano's Food Truck
